content.rendered:
They say it isn’t a good idea but I’ve found myself doing quite a lot of this recently – and it’s been fine! Lots of very charming young people (not kids, really) and a number of perfectly well-behaved quadrupeds.

These were taken at Oaklands College, St Albans, where I’ve been doing some photography for their marketing department. Over several quite intense days we’ve covered pretty much every subject area I think – from animal care to construction to education to forensic science. And everything in between.
